channel.title: Requesting title screen error
channel.description:
Hey mopar, I'm making a new 2006 old-school server, But it keeps saying requesting title screen,
Then hop to connecting error, retrying in 4,3,2,1 etc...
So, any ideas? I just added cachedownloader, All works fine, The .jar works fine, but the webclient just doesnt... I put the same .jar, on my desktop it works. But it doesnt work in my website, and the code is right.
"Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(location+"Background.png");" Sprites.java ^

item.title: Requesting title screen error
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Hey mopar,
I’m making a new 2006 old-school server,
But it keeps saying requesting title screen,

Then hop to connecting error, retrying in 4,3,2,1 etc…

So, any ideas?
I just added cachedownloader,
All works fine,
The .jar works fine, but the webclient just doesnt…
I put the same .jar, on my desktop it works.
But it doesnt work in my website, and the code is right.

“Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(location+“Background.png”);”
Sprites.java ^

Read full topic
